sentences.en: a political party that’s in the ascendant
sentences.cn: 一个正在发展壮大的政党
一个政治影响力越来越大的国家

sentences.en: Ascendant is very demonstrative, and they like drama and grand gestures.
sentences.cn: 狮子座感外露, 他们喜欢戏剧化和浮夸的样子表达.

sentences.en: At first Athens was in the ascendant, then Sparta.
sentences.cn: 起初雅典占了优势, 后来斯巴达居上.

sentences.en: At present, the project risk management of China is in the ascendant.
sentences.cn: 目前, 我国工程项目风险管理方兴未艾.

sentences.en: At that period the star of France was definitely in the ascendant.
sentences.cn: 那一时期,法国无疑是吉星高照,蒸蒸日上.

sentences.en: But pro - European moderates in Serbia are back in the ascendant.
sentences.cn: 但是,塞尔维亚的亲欧洲温和派大力回归.

sentences.en: Certainly they knew about the capture of the Ascendant Justice by John.
sentences.cn: 他们当然知道约翰占领了无尚正义号.

sentences.en: Her star seems very much in the ascendant.
His star was in the ascendant.
Leo Ascendant is very demonstrative and they like drama and grand gestures.
sentences.cn: 狮子座感外露,他们喜欢戏剧化和妄诞的状貌表达.

sentences.en: The dynamic technique is verified correct and ascendant in actual system.
sentences.cn: 在实际环境中验证了该动态技术的正确性和优越性.

sentences.en: the reformers are in the ascendant.
sentences.cn: 改革者的影响正在增长。

sentences.en: The study of carbon fiber cement - based composites is in the ascendant nowadays.
sentences.cn: 碳纤维水泥基复合材料的研究方兴未艾.

sentences.en: This Ascendant is warm, generous and fun to be around.
sentences.cn: 这种上升型星座给身边的人温暖 、 慷慨和有趣的感觉.

sentences.en: Tourism is now in the ascendant and its developing foreground is vast.
sentences.cn: 旅游业方兴未艾,发展前景广阔.

sentences.en: We still have the ascendant position in world politics.
sentences.cn: 我们在国际政治中仍占优势地位.

sentences.en: Why are Geography, Drama, Art and English in the ascendant?
sentences.cn: 为什么地理、戏剧、艺术和英语逐渐受宠？

words.tran_cn: 优势；权势；支配地位（等于ascendence或者ascendancy）
上升的人或物；字母的上半（或下半）出头部分

phrases.tran_cn: 力量(或影响）正在增长的

trans.tran_cn: 占优势的，运星，命宫，祖先
